processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: In order to streamline the process of applying collection numbers, Special Collections staff completed a large-scale renumbering campaign in 2017-2018. This collection was previously cataloged as SC 5010.5.

bioghist.head: Bio/Historical Note
bioghist.p: Mary Elizabeth "Betty" Clougherty Miller is a 1945 graduate of Madison College. She and her husband, Robert, have three children and five grandchildren. She has worked as a homemaker since graduation and has volunteered with the Girl Scouts, her church, the PTA, the League of Women Voters, and the Federated Woman's Club.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection is comprised of one dance card from 1945, 2 alumni reunion programs for the class of 1945's 50th and 55th reunions, one small color snapshot circa 1960 of reunion participants and two 8x10 color photographs of the 50th and 55th reunion groups.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is housed in one folder.
